name: Disruption (WYL TEAM, bigwowik)
description:
Game for Ludum dare 49.
 Disruption

Nathan is an ordinary office clerk, working within four walls from day to day. His biggest problem is not the amount of work, deadlines, or an angry boss, but his unstable state. He has to deal with the echoes of difficult moments in life on a daily basis and look for good memories in the backs of memory in order to cope with them.

Will he be able to overcome all trials and restore balance?

if you want to know more about the essence of 💀 monsters, try to die once by them

Strongly recommend to play with headphones

Controls:

WASD - to move

E - to use

Mouse - to aim

LMB - to shoot

🎮🎮🎮🎮🎮🎮🎮🎮🎮🎮🎮🎮🎮🎮
